resource.name: {% if vars.item.headers.subject %}Phishing Email: {{vars.item.headers.subject}} {% else %} None {% endif %}
resource.source: {% if  'reporterEmailAddress' in vars.item %}User Reported{% else %}Email Server{% endif %}
resource.fileHash: {% if vars.item.attachments | json_query("[*].metadata.md5") | join(',') %}{{vars.item.attachments | json_query("[*].metadata.md5") | join(', ')}}{%else%}NA{% endif%}
resource.sourceId: {% if vars.item.headers['message-id'] %} {{ vars.item.headers['message-id'] | join }} {% else %} null {% endif %}
resource.fileNames: {% if vars.item.attachments | json_query("[*].metadata.md5") | join(',') %}{{vars.item.attachments | json_query("[*].metadata.md5") | join(', ')}}{%else%}NA{% endif%}
resource.returnPath: {% if vars.item.headers['return-path'] %}{{ (vars.item.headers['return-path'] |join(", ") if vars.item.headers['return-path'] is not string else vars.item.headers['return-path']) | replace("<","") | replace(">","")}}{% endif %}
resource.recipientEmailAddress: {% if vars.item.headers['to'] is not string %}{{vars.item.headers['to'] | join(',') }}{%else%}{{vars.item.headers['to']}}{% endif%}
